author: arizzi
body:
update the delta pt,eta,phi when calling setP4 and setPz so that track momentum is unchanged as discussed in XPOG meeting on sept 4th.

Seems to do the right thing (similar unit test added)
root [0] pat::PackedCandidate a;
root [1] a.eta()
(double) 0.000000
root [2] a.etaAtVtx()
(float) 0.00000f
root [3] a.pt()
(double) 0.000000
root [7] a.ptTrk()
(double) 0.000000
root [8] a.setP4(reco::Candidate::PolarLorentzVector(10,2,3,5))
root [9] a.ptTrk()
(double) 0.000000
root [10] a.pt()
(double) 10.000000
root [11] a.eta()
(double) 1.999939
root [12] a.etaAtVtx()
(float) -0.00006f
root [13] a.setPz(10)
root [14] a.eta()
(double) 0.881314
root [15] a.etaAtVtx()
(float) -0.00003f
title: MiniAOD: PackedCandidate::setP4 preserve track kinematic
